metadata.name: Fernando Bahistin
metadata.description:
This is Fernando. He shares with us what he sells: ...and we have Clarín, Nación, we have all chronicles, Caras Magazine, of gossip, of news, decoration, I sell all of that.

Collectors will receive:

1.  NFT 1/1  
2. Printed photograph 14X20 cm (only primary collector)  
3. Either the product of the vendor, photo or video of the product or special video of the vendor. (only primary collector)  
4. Unlockable content. 
5. The Research (as it evolves over time it will be shared)  
6. Becoming a philanthropist, as 10% of the first sale goes back to the beach vendor.  
7. Becoming a producer, with % of the sales Romina will travel to the next beach to produce the next series.

License:  
The holder is free to use the NFT for self advertising, displayed privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
